content:
$$ \mathbb{E}(X) = \int x d F(x) = \left{ \begin{aligned} \sum_x x f(x) ; & \text{ if } X \text{ is discrete} \ \int x f(x) dx ; & \text{ if } X \text{ is continuous } \end{aligned} \right. $$
Inline math $ \frac{1}{2} $
